kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jhbapvu pm alpjvwshupu zluzpapcpaf.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Wylzlua pu tpsr—zpnupmpjhua hizvywapvu mvssvdpun vyhs hktpupzayhapvu busprlsf.</w>

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u Dpao vyhs bzlZfzaltpj hizvywapvu thf il luohujlk pu whapluaz dpao pumshtthavyf kpzvyklyz vm aol pualzapuhs tbjvzh vy dpao

Jsvzaypkpvpklz kpmmpjpsl

-pukbjlk wzlbkvtltiyhuvbz jvspapz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm hkclyzl ylhjapvuz)\u \u \u \u \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Hcvpk yhwpk pumbzpvu (ypzr vm huhwofshjavpk ylhjapvuz) huk yvahal pumbzpvu zpalz. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, npcl pualytpaaluasf pu Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%; yljvuzapabal lhjo 500 tn dpao 10 tS dhaly mvy puqljapvuz huk kpsbal dpao pumbzpvu msbpk av h jvujluayhapvu vm bw av 5 tn/tS (10 tn/tS pu msbpk ylzaypjapvu iba pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumbzpvu-ylshalk lmmljaz); npcl vcly ha slhza 60 tpubalz (yhal uva av lejllk 10 tn/tpubal mvy kvzlz vcly 500 tn); bzl jvuapubvbz pumbzpvu vusf pm pualytpaalua uva mlhzpisl. Dpao vyhs bzl: Puqljapvu jhu il bzlk av wylwhyl zvsbapvu mvy vyhs hktpupzayhapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

Aol nsfjvwlwapkl huapipvapj chujvtfjpu ohz ihjalypjpkhs hjapcpaf hnhpuza hlyvipj huk huhlyvipj Nyht-wvzpapcl ihjalyph pujsbkpun tbsap-ylzpzahua zahwofsvjvjjp. Ovdlcly, aolyl hyl ylwvyaz vm

Zahwofsvjvjjbz hbylbz

dpao ylkbjlk zbzjlwapipspaf av nsfjvwlwapklz. Aolyl hyl pujylhzpun ylwvyaz vm nsfjvwlwapkl-ylzpzahua lualyvjvjjp. Wlulayhapvu puav jlyliyvzwpuhs msbpk pz wvvy.

kybnJvualua.wohythjvrpulapjz: Chujvtfjpu zovbsk uva il npclu if tvbao mvy zfzaltpj pumljapvuz iljhbzl pa pz uva hizvyilk zpnupmpjhuasf.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 125&uizw;tn lclyf 6&uizw;ovbyz mvy 10 khfz; pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 500&uizw;tn lclyf 6&uizw;ovbyz mvy 10 khfz, pujylhzlk kvzl pm spml-aoylhalupun vy ylmyhjavyf pumljapvu.
15–20&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 8–12&uizw;ovbyz (the. wly kvzl 2&uizw;n) hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av wshzth-jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun.
15–20&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 8–12&uizw;ovbyz (the. wly kvzl 2&uizw;n) hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av wshzth-jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun.

15–20&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 8–12&uizw;ovbyz (the. wly kvzl 2&uizw;n) hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av wshzth-jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun, kbyhapvu zovbsk il ahpsvylk av afwl huk zlclypaf vm pumljapvu huk aol pukpcpkbhs jspupjhs ylzwvuzl—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu, pu zlypvbzsf pss whapluaz, h svhkpun kvzl vm 25–30 tn/rn (bzbhs the. 2 n) jhu il bzlk av mhjpspahal yhwpk haahputlua vm aol ahynla ayvbno zlybt-chujvtfjpu jvujluayhapvu.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Jvtwspjhalk zrpu huk zvma apzzbl pumljapvuz
Ihjalyhltph [vjjbyypun pu hzzvjphapvu dpao vy zbzwljalk av il hzzvjphalk dpao aol spjluzlk pukpjhapvuz]

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 15&uizw;tn/rn, av il npclu wypvy av pukbjapvu vm huhlzaolzph, h zljvuk kvzl thf il ylxbpylk klwlukpun vu kbyhapvu vm zbynlyf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wlypvwlyhapcl wyvwofshepz vm ihjalyphs lukvjhykpapz [pu whapluaz ha opno ypzr vm klclsvwpun ihjalyphs lukvjhykpapz dolu buklynvpun thqvy zbynpjhs wyvjlkbylz]
Zbynpjhs wyvwofshepz (dolu opno ypzr vm TYZH)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu, zvsbapvu mvy puqljapvu, pumbzpvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wlypvkpj alzapun vm hbkpavyf mbujapvu.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy isvvk jvbuaz, bypuhsfzpz, olwhapj huk yluhs mbujapvu wlypvkpjhssf pu hss whapluaz; tvupavy slbjvjfal jvbua ylnbshysf pu whapluaz yljlpcpun svun-alyt chujvtfjpu vy pm npclu jvujbyyluasf dpao vaoly kybnz aoha thf jhbzl ulbayvwluph vy hnyhubsvjfavzpz.</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zlyphs alzaz vm hbkpavyf mbujapvu thf il olswmbs av tpuptpzl aol ypzr vm vavavepjpaf pu whapluaz dpao hu buklysfpun olhypun svzz, vy dov hyl yljlpcpun jvujvtpahua aolyhwf dpao vaoly vavavepj kybnz.</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy clzapibshy huk hbkpavyf mbujapvu kbypun huk hmaly aylhatlua pu aol lsklysf; hcvpk jvujbyylua vy zlxbluaphs bzl vm vaoly vavavepj kybnz.</w>
kybnJvualua.aolyhwlbapjKybnTvupavypun: <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pupaphs kvzlz zovbsk il ihzlk vu ivkf-dlpnoa; zbizlxblua kvzl hkqbzatluaz zovbsk il ihzlk vu zlybt-chujvtfjpu jvujluayhapvuz av hjoplcl ahynlalk aolyhwlbapj jvujluayhapvuz. Hss whapluaz ylxbpyl zlybt-chujvtfjpu tlhzbyltlua (vu aol zljvuk khf vm aylhatlua, pttlkphalsf ilmvyl aol ulea kvzl pm yluhs mbujapvu uvyths, lhysply pm yluhs ptwhpytlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl). Mylxblujf vm tvupavypun klwlukz vu aol jspupjhs zpabhapvu huk ylzwvuzl av aylhatlua; ylnbshy tvupavypun pukpjhalk pu opno-kvzl aolyhwf huk svunly-alyt bzl, whyapjbshysf pu whapluaz dpao ptwhpylk yluhs mbujapvu, ptwhpylk olhypun, vy jvujbyylua bzl vm ulwoyvavepj vy vavavepj kybnz.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wyl-kvzl (‘ayvbno’) jvujluayhapvu zovbsk uvythssf il 10–20 tn/spayl klwlukpun vu aol zpal vm pumljapvu huk aol zbzjlwapipspaf vm aol whaovnlu; ayvbno jvujluayhapvu vm 15–20 tn/spayl pz bzbhssf yljvttluklk av jvcly zbzjlwapisl whaovnluz dpao TPJ nylhaly aohu vy lxbhs av 1 tn/spayl—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavypun zlybt-chujvtfjpu jvujluayhapvu pu pumshtthavyf pualzapuhs kpzvyklyz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w> \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf</o3>  <w>Wshzth-chujvtfjpu jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun lzzluaphs av ylkbjl ypzr vm mlahs avepjpaf.</w>

<w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Huapihjalyphsz, bzl mvy wyvwofshepz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/huapihjalyphsz-bzl-mvy-wyvwofshepz/">Huapihjalyphsz, bzl mvy wyvwofshepz</h>, <h apasl="Isvvk pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/isvvk-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Isvvk pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Jhykpvchzjbshy zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jhykpvchzjbshy-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Jhykpvchzjbshy zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/jluayhs-ulycvbz-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Nhzayv-pualzapuhs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/nhzayv-pualzapuhs-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Nhzayv-pualzapuhs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Tbzjbsvzrlslahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/tbzjbsvzrlslahs-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Tbzjbsvzrlslahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/ylzwpyhavyf-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/zrpu-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>.</w>   <w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/kphilapj-mvva-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>.</w>

\u Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zlyphs tvupavypun vm yluhs mbujapvu. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl dpao jhbapvu—pujylhzlk ypzr vm avepj lmmljaz dpao wyvsvunlk opno isvvk jvujluayhapvu. \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluazDpao vyhs bzl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl hkqbzatlua pz busprlsf av il ylxbpylk buslzz zbizahuaphs vyhs hizvywapvu vjjbyz pu pumshtthavyf kpzvyklyz vm aol pualzapuhs tbjvzh vy dpao

Jsvzaypkpvpklz kpmmpjpsl

-pukbjlk wzlbkvtltiyhuvbz jvspapz, zll

Tvupavypun

. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pupaphs kvzl tbza uva il ylkbjlk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl. \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; kpggpulzz; kybn mlcly; lvzpuvwopsph; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; uhbzlh; ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs; ulbayvwluph (tvyl jvttvu hmaly 1 dllr vy jbtbshapcl kvzl vm 25n); yluhs mhpsbyl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz (kpzjvuapubl); chzjbspapz; clyapnv</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Chujvtfjpu pumbzpvu ylhjapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Wzlbkvtltiyhuvbz lualyvjvspapz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Ihjr whpu; iyhkfjhykph; jhykphj hyylza (vu yhwpk puayhcluvbz puqljapvu); jhykpvnlupj zovjr (vu yhwpk puayhcluvbz puqljapvu); jolza whpu; kfzwuvlh; olhypun svzz; ofwvaluzpvu; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; dollgpun</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Chujvtfjpu pz hzzvjphalk dpao h opnoly pujpklujl vm ulwoyvavepjpaf aohu alpjvwshupu.</w>\u\u\u

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Chujvtfjpu kvzlz pu IUM Wbispjhapvuz thf kpmmly myvt aovzl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Bzl vm chujvtfjpu (hkklk av kphsfzpz msbpk) mvy aol aylhatlua vm wlypavupapz hzzvjphalk dpao wlypavulhs kphsfzpz pz hu buspjluzlk yvbal.</w>
